statements: SELECT * FROM genetic_samples_metadata;
SELECT sample_name, researcher_name, research_topic FROM genetic_samples_metadata;
SELECT sample_id, sample_name, location_collected FROM genetic_samples_metadata WHERE researcher_name = 'John Smith';
SELECT sample_id, sample_name, date_collected FROM genetic_samples_metadata ORDER BY date_collected DESC;
SELECT sample_id, sample_description FROM genetic_samples_metadata WHERE research_topic = 'Genomics' AND date_collected > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM genetic_samples_metadata WHERE research_topic = 'Genomics';
SELECT sample_name, researcher_name, date_collected FROM genetic_samples_metadata WHERE location_collected = 'Lab 1' ORDER BY date_collected DESC;
SELECT sample_id, research_topic, location_collected FROM genetic_samples_metadata WHERE researcher_name = 'Alice' OR researcher_name = 'Bob';
SELECT * FROM genetic_samples_metadata WHERE date_collected BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30' ORDER BY date_collected ASC;
SELECT sample_name, sample_description FROM genetic_samples_metadata WHERE research_topic = 'Genetics' AND location_collected = 'Lab 2';
SELECT * FROM genetic_samples
SELECT sample_id, sample_type FROM genetic_samples WHERE patient_id = 100
SELECT researcher_name FROM genetic_samples WHERE collection_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM research_projects WHERE start_date < '2022-05-01'
SELECT project_name, lead_researcher FROM research_projects
SELECT sample_id, collection_date, researcher_name FROM genetic_samples WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT sample_type, patient_id, collection_date FROM genetic_samples WHERE researcher_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM genetic_samples WHERE collection_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT sample_id, sample_type, collection_date, researcher_name FROM genetic_samples WHERE collection_date < '2022-06-01';
SELECT patient_id, sample_type FROM genetic_samples WHERE researcher_name LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT * FROM sample_metadata;
SELECT sample_name, sample_type, collection_date FROM sample_metadata WHERE sample_type = 'Blood';
SELECT researcher_name, institution FROM researcher_info ORDER BY researcher_name ASC;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM research_project WHERE end_date > '2021-12-31';
SELECT sample_id, sample_name, researcher_id, collection_date FROM sample_metadata ORDER BY collection_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM sample_metadata;
SELECT sample_id, sample_name, collection_date FROM sample_metadata WHERE sample_type = 'Blood';
SELECT sample_id, sample_name, researcher_name FROM sample_metadata JOIN researcher_info ON sample_metadata.researcher_id = researcher_info.researcher_id;
SELECT * FROM sample_metadata WHERE collection_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY collection_date DESC;
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date, end_date FROM research_project WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM GeneticSampleMetadata;
SELECT sample_name, sample_type, collection_date FROM GeneticSampleMetadata;
SELECT researcher_name, email FROM ResearcherInformation;
SELECT sample_id, analysis_type, result_summary FROM AnalysisResults;
SELECT * FROM SampleStorageLocation;
SELECT * FROM GeneticSampleMetadata WHERE sample_id = 1;
SELECT sample_name, sample_type FROM GeneticSampleMetadata WHERE collection_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM ResearcherInformation WHERE institution_name = 'University of Research';
SELECT result_id, analysis_type FROM AnalysisResults ORDER BY result_id DESC;
SELECT sample_id, freezer_location FROM SampleStorageLocation WHERE storage_status = 'available';
SELECT * FROM genetic_samples;
SELECT sample_id, sample_name, sample_type FROM genetic_samples WHERE collection_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT researcher_id, project_id FROM genetic_samples ORDER BY collection_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM researchers WHERE affiliation LIKE '%University%';
SELECT id, lab_name, location FROM lab_facilities WHERE lab_manager = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM genetic_samples WHERE sample_type = 'Blood';
SELECT sample_name, sample_type FROM genetic_samples WHERE collection_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM researchers WHERE affiliation = 'University X';
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT sample_name, result_value, result_unit FROM genetic_samples JOIN analytical_results ON genetic_samples.sample_id = analytical_results.sample_id WHERE result_value > 5;
